rules.title: Required fields
rules.description: Core identifying and budget fields must be present.

rules.title: Date validity
rules.description: Start and completion dates must be valid formats.

rules.title: Numeric fields
rules.description: Budget and climate fields must be numeric or null.

rules.title: Total arithmetic
rules.description: Total should match PS + MOOE + CO with tolerance.

rules.title: Climate bounds
rules.description: CCA + CCM must not exceed total with tolerance.

rules.title: Topology code format
rules.description: CC topology code should follow expected pattern.

rules.title: PRM indicator presence
rules.description: Combined indicator key should be null or non-empty.
